amendment.description: Amendment requires CBO to update its report from 2004 on the budgetary analysis of the NASA's Vision for the Nation's Space Exploration Program. This report is to be completed in 6 months.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 110-707 to require CBO to update their report from 2004 on the budgetary analysis of the NASA's Vision for the Nation's Space Exploration Program. This report is to be completed in 6 months.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wu amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
